Which disc is this? The one before, labelled S7D1, was really S7D2, so which disc is this? I assume it's not the same disc once again.
Mr_Fear this is S7D2 again.  You already uploaded this disc when u made the S7D1 torrent.  This one should be stopped and S7D1 uploaded please.

Thanks a lot for uploading this, Not sure but I think that this is the same DVD S7D2, since DVD S7D1 was really DVD S7D2, this should be DVD S7D1 :D lol, plz can you confirm this?, thanks again for uploading.

Confirmed It's S7D2 Again (same as the S7D1 Which is in fact S7D2) I checked CRC against the S7D1 and they are exactly the same.
